subTitle: Have a look at my projects!

projects.title: Bloodsuggar logger
projects.subTitle: Use my home server as a glucose monitoring system
projects.content: On my home server, I built a docker based infrastructure that synchonizes blood sugar values from my glucose monitoring system and helped me managing my glucose. I became a Github contributor for several core project pieces e.g. The IOS app nightguard.
projects.title: Foobar awesomeness
projects.subTitle: Was gehtn
projects.content: Small smart home project I built to dive into this amazing world

projects.title: Staining of Digital Histology Slides Using Generative Adversarial Networks
projects.subTitle: Master thesis
projects.content: Prostate cancer is considered to be as one of the principal medical problems of the male population. As such I investigated how a tissue sample might virtual stained in order to highlight biological structures of the tissue using AI technology.

projects.title: Mods
projects.subTitle: Collection of game mods intended to learn unity
projects.content: During the pandemic, I learned aspects of the Unity game engine that eventually led to the creation of several mods using the C# programming language.

projects.title: Policy iteration for an energy storage problem
projects.subTitle: Seminar paper
projects.content: - Using dynamic programming i.e. solving a Markov Decision Process, I implemented Ronald Howard’s policy iteration algorithm in Python to solve an energy storage optimization problem.

projects.title: HackerCV
projects.subTitle: Basic scaffold for this website.
projects.content: A simple website scaffold with which you can present yourself as a programmer.

projects.title: Neopixel web controller
projects.subTitle: Web-based controller for by Raspberry Pi
projects.content: After I built a lamp for my student apartment by soldering a raspberry pi with Adafruit’s Neopixel, I built a web based controller to adjust it’s color and brightness.
Small smart home project I built to dive into this amazing world. This is a larger text to text the content thanks.
After I built a lamp for my student apartment by soldering a raspberry pi with Adafruit’s Neopixel, I built a web based controller to adjust it’s color and brightness.
